TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Calasiv, title = Calasiv, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Calasiv} }

S.FORM: = Calasiv = Gaga mniq Pingtung Rayyisyang ka alang Calasiv. 157 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 538 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 96% niqan 514 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 4% niqan 24 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Paiwan89%, Amis1%, Tayal1%, ni rahuq na o3%. Pusu nniqan alang Hangan Calasiv nii o niqan bi pahung na snaw msa. Nniqan alang Nuysan Pintung nsgan Rayyi alang Calasiv. Nniqan gasuc Ga mniq nsgan ruwan ksska mpitu alang ka alang Calasiv, hunac o lutuc alang Wenre, lutuc alang Rayyi ka hraan hidaw, kssiyaw alang Yirin ka daya hraan hidaw, lutuc alang Kuro ka gqiyan hidaw. Pgkla patas cyawtung Ppanun rulu:Kndadax sngyan rulu qrngul ppanan basu Pingtung quri Rayyi, dhuq do priyux haya musa alang. Quri Pingtung:Tay yi syen-Nsgan Sinpi, quri saw Syangtan, lutuc dgiyaq kungru kika dhuq da. Quri Kawcyung:Nanerkaw-Tucing Nancwo cyawryodaw. Sjiqan klgan nealang Seejiq Paywan. Djiyun kari Kari Paywan ni kari tlug. Snhiyun cungcyaw Tyencucyaw. Pnaah alang Minkwo 42 hngkawas kndadax (Carasywo),(Cyaraafus)tnhjil hini ni pnhyugan kingal alang. Kika balay bi alang Paywan. Mniq gqiyan hidaw ssiyaw yayung mdudul gggiyaq, lutuc hunac alang Wenre, lutuc gqiyan hidaw alang Kuro, daya hraan hidaw ni ssiyaw alang Yirin. Pgkla patas rmigaw

= Calasiv = Gaga mniq Pingtong Rayyisyang ka alang Calasiv. 157 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 538 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 96% niqan 514 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 4% niqan 24 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Paiwan89%, Amis1%, Tayal1%, ni rahoq na o3%. Poso nniqan alang Hangan Calasiv nii o niqan bi pahong na snaw msa. Nniqan alang Noysan Pintong nsgan Rayyi alang Calasiv. Nniqan gasoc Ga mniq nsgan rowan ksska mpito alang ka alang Calasiv, honac o lotoc alang Wenre, lotoc alang Rayyi ka hraan hidaw, kssiyaw alang Yirin ka daya hraan hidaw, lotoc alang Koro ka gqiyan hidaw. Pgkla patas cyawtong Ppanon rolo:Kndadax sngyan rolo qrngol ppanan baso Pingtong qori Rayyi, dhoq do priyox haya mosa alang. Qori Pingtong:Tay yi syen-Nsgan Sinpi, qori saw Syangtan, lotoc dgiyaq kongro kika dhoq da. Qori Kawcyong:Nanerkaw-Tocing Nancwo cyawryodaw. Sjiqan klgan nealang Seejiq Paywan. Djiyon kari Kari Paywan ni kari tlog. Snhiyon congcyaw Tyencocyaw. Pnaah alang Minkwo 42 hngkawas kndadax (Carasywo),(Cyaraafos)tnhjil hini ni pnhyogan kingal alang. Kika balay bi alang Paywan. Mniq gqiyan hidaw ssiyaw yayong mdodol gggiyaq, lotoc honac alang Wenre, lotoc gqiyan hidaw alang Koro, daya hraan hidaw ni ssiyaw alang Yirin. Pgkla patas rmigaw
